Text: Yay!  You're so reliable, I don't even know why I ask for stuff.
:) You can ask for stuff if you see that it isn't there- I don't mind. YW, buddy!

The sound and video are not synchronized after the first minute or so of the broadcast.  I set a -4200 millisecond audio delay, which has worked up until the mid-way point at least.  I'll post again if anything changes.
